required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness Study of Nivolumab Compared to Placebo in Prevention of Recurrent Melanoma After Complete Resection of Stage IIB/C Melanoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind Study of Adjuvant Immunotherapy With Nivolumab Versus Placebo After Complete Resection of Stage IIB/C Melanoma

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of nivolumab adjuvant immunotherapy compared to placebo in adults and pediatric participants after complete resection of Stage IIB/C melanoma with no evidence of disease (NED) who are at high risk for recurrence.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
Number of Participants with Adverse Events (AEs)
Outcomes on Next-Line therapies (Objective response rate [if applicable], Duration of treatment on next-line therapies, Progression-Free Survival 2)
Incidence of change in Vital Signs
Incidence of change in clinical laboratory values

arm_group.description: placebo equivalent specified dose on specified days

intervention.description: Matched placebo specified dose on specified days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Had a negative sentinel lymph node biopsy
- Participant has not been previously treated for melanoma
- ECOG 0 or 1
- Participants must have been diagnosed with histologically confirmed, Resected, Stage IIB/C cutaneous melanoma
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of ocular or mucosal melanoma.
- Pregnant or nursing women
- Participants with active known or suspected autoimmune disease
- Known history of allergy or hypersensitivity to study drug components
- Prior treatment with an anti-PD-1, anti-PD-L1, anti-PD-L2, anti-CD137, anti-CTLA-4 antibody, or agents that target IL-2 pathways, T-cell stimulators, or checkpoint pathways
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply.

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information,
